home_p: The law office of Attorney Hamza Doğa KORKMAZLAR is an independent legal practice built upon the principles of professionalism and integrity. It aims to provide legal consultancy and attorneyship services with the diligence required by the profession, while representing clients transparently throughout all legal processes. Adopting the rule of law and natural law principles as its core values, the office is committed to maintaining a professional identity that respects human rights and nature.
about_p: Born and raised in Antalya, Attorney Hamza Doğa KORKMAZLAR graduated from Aldemir Atilla Konuk Anatolian High School and later from Marmara University Faculty of Law. After gaining experience in various law firms in Istanbul, he completed his legal internship in Antalya. He is currently pursuing a master's degree at Akdeniz University Faculty of Tourism. Fluent in English, he has also taken part in numerous social responsibility projects and European Union programs. He continues his practice with a transparent, diligent, and accessible service approach grounded in respect for human rights and nature.

text_h1: FOREST QUALIFICATION AND TITLE DEED CANCELLATION PRACTICES IN TURKISH LAW
text_h2: THE PRINCIPLE OF CORRECTIVE JUSTICE AND ADDITIONAL DAMAGE IN TURKISH LAW
text_p1: In the Turkish legal system, forest qualification and private ownership often conflict both historically and socioeconomically. Today, privately owned properties may be classified as forest land by the state, leading to the inclusion of such properties within forest boundaries and the cancellation of the title deed...
text_p2: Türkiye is known for its inflationary economic structure. In recent years and throughout its history, the country has frequently experienced inflationary periods.
